verses.english: Thou shalt increase my greatness, and comfort me on every side.

derivation: or גְּדֻלָּה; (shortened) or (less accurately) גְּדוּלָּה; feminine of H1419 (גָּדוֹל);
strongs_def: greatness; (concretely) mighty acts
gloss: dignity, great things(-ness), majesty.

strongs_def: to revolve, surround, or border; used in various applications, literally and figuratively

gloss: comfort (self), ease (one's self), repent(-er,-ing, self).

verses.english: I will also praise thee with the psaltery, even thy truth, O my God: unto thee will I sing with the harp, O thou Holy One of Israel.

derivation: by contraction from an unused root meaning to gather;
strongs_def: properly, assemblage; used only adverbially also, even, yea, though; often repeated as correl. both...and
gloss: again, alike, also, (so much) as (soon), both (so)...and, but, either...or, even, for all, (in) likewise (manner), moreover, nay...neither, one, then(-refore), though, what, with, yea.

strongs_def: I
gloss: I, (as for) me, mine, myself, we, [idiom] which, [idiom] who.

derivation: a primitive root; used only as denominative from H3027 (יָד); literally, to use (i.e. hold out) the hand;
strongs_def: physically, to throw (a stone, an arrow) at or away; especially to revere or worship (with extended hands); intensively, to bemoan (by wringing the hands)
gloss: cast (out), (make) confess(-ion), praise, shoot, (give) thank(-ful, -s, -sgiving).

strongs_def: something prepared, i.e. any apparatus (as an implement, utensil, dress, vessel or weapon)

strongs_def: a skin-bag for liquids (from collapsing when empty); hence, a vase (as similar in shape when full); also a lyre (as having a body of like form)
gloss: bottle, pitcher, psaltery, vessel, viol.

strongs_def: stability; (figuratively) certainty, truth, trustworthiness
gloss: assured(-ly), establishment, faithful, right, sure, true (-ly, -th), verity.

strongs_def: gods in the ordinary sense; but specifically used (in the plural thus, especially with the article) of the supreme God; occasionally applied by way of deference to magistrates; and sometimes as a superlative
gloss: angels, [idiom] exceeding, God (gods) (-dess, -ly), [idiom] (very) great, judges, [idiom] mighty.

derivation: a primitive root (perhaps identical with H2168 (זָמַר) through the idea of striking with the fingers); properly, to touch the strings or parts of a musical instrument, i.e.
strongs_def: play upon it; to make music, accompanied by the voice; hence to celebrate in song and music
gloss: give praise, sing forth praises, psalms.

derivation: from a unused root meaning to twang;
strongs_def: a harp

strongs_def: sacred (ceremonially or morally); (as noun) God (by eminence), an angel, a saint, a sanctuary
gloss: holy (One), saint.

derivation: from H8280 (שָׂרָה) and H410 (אֵל); he will rule as God;
strongs_def: Jisrael, a symbolical name of Jacob; also (typically) of his posterity
gloss: Israel.

verses.english: My lips shall greatly rejoice when I sing unto thee; and my soul, which thou hast redeemed.

strongs_def: properly, to creak (or emit a stridulous sound), i.e. to shout (usually for joy)
gloss: aloud for joy, cry out, be joyful (greatly, make to) rejoice, (cause to) shout (for joy), (cause to) sing (aloud, for joy, out), triumph.

derivation: or (in dual and plural) שֶׂפֶת; probably from H5595 (סָפָה) or H8192 (שָׁפָה) through the idea of termination (compare H5490 (סוֹף));
strongs_def: the lip (as a natural boundary); by implication, language; by analogy, a margin (of a vessel, water, cloth, etc.)
gloss: band, bank, binding, border, brim, brink, edge, language, lip, prating, (sea-)shore, side, speech, talk, (vain) words.

derivation: a primitive particle (the full form of the prepositional prefix) indicating causal relations of all kinds, antecedent or consequent;
